description.value: The Functional Somatic Symptoms DataSchema is developed by BioSHaRE.EU (Biobank Standardisation and Harmonisation for Research Excellence in the European Union) investigators to support emergence of a series of collaborative research projects on somatic symptoms. The DataSchema aims to enable retrospective harmonization of information across population-based cohorts and determine, for exemple, the prevalence of specific functional somatic symptoms across European countries.
